haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Ltn Patrik Schorner, Ltn Patrik Schorner
Ltn Rudiger Bretschneider, Ltn Rudiger Bretschneider
Ltn Eberhardt Auch, Ltn Eberhardt Auch
Fw Nikolaus Fechter, Fw Nikolaus Fechter

 The mission was flown from Pukov aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 03/04/1916 near Factory.
A infantry was destroyed by Eberhardt Auch of FA 15.
Eberhardt Auch and Rupert Freudenberg were  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 03/04/1916 near Factory.
A infantry was destroyed by Patrik Schorner of FA 15.
Patrik Schorner and Rudiger Hoelscher were  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 03/04/1916 near Factory.
A infantry was destroyed by Patrik Schorner of FA 15.
Patrik Schorner and Rudiger Hoelscher were  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 03/04/1916 near Factory.
A infantry was destroyed by Patrik Schorner of FA 15.
Patrik Schorner and Rudiger Hoelscher were  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 03/04/1916 near Factory.
A infantry was destroyed by Rudiger Bretschneider of FA 15.
Rudiger Bretschneider and Veit Traub were  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 03/04/1916 near Factory.
A Sikorsky S-16 of 7th AOI was brought down by Uwe Schneider of FA 15.
Lt Levka Lebedinsky was killed in action.
Uwe Schneider was  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 03/04/1916 near Factory.
A Sikorsky S-16 of 7th AOI was brought down by Conrad Seiler of FA 15.
Cpt Evgenii Bukir was killed in action.
Conrad Seiler was  flying a Roland C.IIa.
narrative: Once more into the breach.  I drop my bombs without effect and only then see an infantry group in the open.  Maddening!  I turn to strafe and several runs have their effect.  My crate is taking the odd round and it is just too hot.  Time to go home before somthing very bad happens.
